title: State-of-the-art fitness center with separate spin room
posting_body: ['$599 OFF YOUR FIRST FULL MONTH!*', '*RESTRICTIONS APPLY', "Long past sun down, you're still on the move.", "That's life in Silicon Valley.", 'Yet living at Cerano Apartments in Milpitas, CA makes it all manageable.', 'By living in Murphy Ranch, you’ll be close to Milpitas Light Rail Station, Highway 237 and I-880 and even walking distance to major employers.', 'After a short commute, easily unwind by cooking an inviting meal in your fully-equipped kitchen, catching a spell-binding sunset from your deck, curling up at the fireside lounge, or taking a moment (or ten) to relax in the Zen garden.', 'When you’re in the mood for something more active, walk across the way to Coyote Creek Trail, or stay on the property to play billiards in the game room or opt for a workout in the fitness center.', 'There’s also your choice of bocce ball, lap swimming at the pool, or browsing your favorite Reddit forums in the Wi-Fi cafe.', 'No matter what you’re in the mood for, you’ll find it at Cerano.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 776 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Kitchen island or breakfast bar', '- In-home washer dryer', "- High 9' ceilings with crown molding", '- Private patio or balcony with French door', '- Generous pantry with adjustable shelves', '- Granite counter tops and choice of antique white or espresso cabinets', '- Clean steel, Energy Star® appliances: gas range, microwave, icemaker refrigerator, dishwasher', 'Community Amenities', '- Adjacent to Coyote Creek Trail and city park with playgrounds, basketball and tennis courts', '- Six distinct courtyards with barbecue areas, Bocce ball, Zen garden and fireside lounge', '- Controlled access, six-level garage with elevators', '- Pets welcome!', '(breed restriction, no weight restriction)', '- State-of-the-art fitness center with separate spin room', '- Clubhouse with eGame room, gourmet kitchen and dining room, billiards and TV lounge', '- Relaxing spa and pool with six-inch wading area', '- Business center and WiFi café', '- Additional storage available', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly!', 'Please visit our website for additional details.', 'Office Hours', 'Mon: 10am-6pm', 'Tues, Thurs, Fri: 10am-6pm', 'Wed: 11am-6pm', 'Sat: 10am-5pm', 'Sun: CLOSED', 'Cerano Apartments', '501 Murphy Ranch Road, Milpitas, CA, 95035', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'ton93xa8s3V']
